definition: to write down (i.e. to decrease the expected value of a loan)
to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: Regulators should force banks to write down the value of second liens, which are often held at vastly inflated values on their balance-sheets.
sentences.chinese: 監管機構需強制銀行減計第二抵押的價值。
